title: which jungler has the most burst damage lategame?

replies.body: Subjective. Entirely depends on the enemies team comp, what you build, what champ youâ€™re playing etc. against a tanky team Yi becomes less bursts and more sustained dmg where something like a khazix will outshine him in burst. Pick your poison is the right answer.

as a jungler main player i would say Master yi 100%, then Tryndamere, Kha Zix and Rengar in that order but can be differ depending on the player, but yeah master yi.... he is crazy strong late..... instant win if you have a taric on your team as well.
Im not jungle main so don't take my word for it, but if we are talking about true junglers (not a lane champ just playing jungle), my bet would be between Rengar, Shadow Assassin Kayn, and Master Yi.
